originalText.text:
I have been using David J. Louie, Inc. for all my insurance needs for many years now. Their prices are reasonable and their staff very knowledgable, accommodating and helpful. I have had claims that were addressed promptly and professionally to my satisfaction.
If David J. Louie, Inc. represents your interests you can be certain of a satisfactory outcome.
I would certainly recommend this firm for any insurance needs. And, as an added bonus, you're always treated like family with their entire staff.

originalText.text: Our office has known David J. Louie and his knowledgeable team for many years. They are extremely courteous and professional.  We have relied on their advice and guidance to ensure our protection and insurance needs.  On top of that, they are always giving back to the community whether be through donations, volunteering or community service.  Mr. Louie volunteered for military service as a dedicated veteran and has been participating and continue to serve at the local American Legion for decades. They are highly recommended.

originalText.text: Parents have had insurance through David J. Louie since the mid 1990s and have no issues. Agents are very honest with how the market is going and are willing to do their best in getting the proper coverage for our home.

text.text: Parents have had insurance through David J. Louie since the mid 1990s and have no issues. Agents are very honest with how the market is going and are willing to do their best in getting the proper coverage for our home.

originalText.text: Always a pleasure to do business with them. When you have a company like DJL that cares about its customers and employees; the results will always be great!

text.text: Always a pleasure to do business with them. When you have a company like DJL that cares about its customers and employees; the results will always be great!

originalText.text: We have worked with David's office since we started our business in 2016 and David has been there every step of the way in helping us navigate proper coverage for our stores.
